研究确定了一种与转移性胰腺癌相关的蛋白质胰腺癌是美国癌症相关死亡的第三大原因，只有 12% 的患者在诊断后五年内存活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-pinpoints-a- Protein-linked-to-metastatic-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-pinpoints-a- Protein-linked-to-metastatic-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=352a652f-5234-4c20-9ff0-6a64ac746002 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 01:51:00 -0500 Study pinpoints a protein linked to metastatic pancreatic cancer
研究人员开发新方法来提高 RNA 测序的准确性牛津大学 NDORMS 的一个团队开发了一种新方法，可以显着提高 RNA 测序的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-improve-the-accuracy-of-RNA-sequencing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-improve-the-accuracy-of-RNA-sequencing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df5121ad-8329-4522-8845-854254d1725d Wed, 07 Feb 2024 01:47:00 -0500 Researchers develop new approach to improve the accuracy of RNA sequencing
研究人员获得 240 万英镑用于为新的 NHS Pharmacy First 服务提供证据英国国家健康与护理研究所 (NIHR) 授予伦敦卫生与热带医学院 (LSHTM) 的研究人员 240 万英镑的资金，用于为新的国家医疗服务体系 (NHS) 药房优先服务提供证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Researchers-receive-c2a324-million-to-generate-evidence-on-the-new-NHS-Pharmacy-First-service.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Researchers-receive-c2a324-million-to-generate-evidence-on-the-new-NHS-Pharmacy-First-service.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3038cf1c-8e25-4df7-b38f-2361e65ac4a8 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 22:24:32 -0500 Researchers receive £2.4 million to generate evidence on the new NHS Pharmacy First service
11 名中风研究人员将在 2024 年国际中风会议上获得表彰11 名在中风研究领域处于领先地位的科学家将在美国中风协会 2024 年国际中风会议上因其杰出的专业成就而受到表彰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Eleven-中风-researchers-to-be-recognized-during-the-2024-International-Stroke-Conference.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Eleven-中风-researchers-to-be-recognized-during-the-2024-International-Stroke-Conference.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c882b885-0c5d-4c19-abb7-39b500669c60 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 22:10:30 -0500 Eleven stroke researchers to be recognized during the 2024 International Stroke Conference
媒体关于父母疫苗犹豫不决的报道导致虚假叙述，扭曲现实科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的两名儿科医生在《新英格兰医学杂志》上发表的社论称，媒体报道聚焦于疫苗犹豫不决的情况可能会扭曲现实，并引发一种错误的叙述，即很大一部分家长拒绝让孩子接种疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Media-stories-on-parental-vaccine-hesitancy-drive-a-false-narrative-violet-reality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Media-stories-on-parental-vaccine-hesitancy-drive-a-false-narrative-violet-reality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d26ba496-5db4-40b8-a2a8-eb16274162ce Tue, 06 Feb 2024 22:01:45 -0500 Media stories on parental vaccine hesitancy drive a false narrative, distort reality
